Directory Sync¶

Restore consistency between directories

class webmynd.dir_sync.DirectorySync(config)[source]¶

Restore consistency between a “user” directory and a number of “target” directories

user_to_target(force=False)[source]¶

Ensure that all files in the user directory have been hardlinked to the right place in platforms’ folders.

Parameters:force – ignore and overwrite any changes in the target directories USE WITH CAUTION
exception webmynd.dir_sync.FromDirectoryMissing[source]¶

A directory is missing in the “user” directory

exception webmynd.dir_sync.SyncError[source]¶

Generic error during syncing

exception webmynd.dir_sync.ToDirectoryMissing[source]¶

A directory is missing in the “target” directory
